Html:
Hello,
I have a question for you: I can draw dashed Routes?

Thanks in advance

Hi Pstariell,
In Visual Basic it looks like this:

tempRoute.Stroke.DashStyle = Drawing2D.DashStyle.Dash

Check the intellisense options when you type the final full stop,,, eg. Drawing2D.DashStyle. <--- here.
The options are :- Custom, Dash, DashDot, DashDotDot, Dot, Solid.

Hope this helps ;-)
